page.title: 09TRADE.
page.content: Fladbury and Wyre Piddle both have one general store and one general store and sub-post office.Fladbury has a butcher and Wyre Piddle has a bakery. From a questionnaire survey on shopping habits it would appear that the function of these shops is to supplement the main shopping purchases made in Evesham,Pershore and Worcester.Of these Evesham is more extensively used,being more accessible with a wider range of shops. The majority of people seem satisfied with their village shops although there are requests for additions,such as a chemist and a hairdresser.
